body:
For me it depends on the character that undergoes gender bender 
Not the whole genre

Never realized people hated gender bend so much. I actually like it, and it gives the reader a "what if" type of feel.
Idk, I cant say what others think, but personally I like gender bend doujins.

I don't know why male characters parodied into female in gender bender hentai like this always have the same looks in every similar doujins like kuroko here for example. Is there an agreed design between doujin artists on how a particular male character would look if he were female?
Yeah this made me decide if I hated or tolerated gender bender..........
